backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Game Vault backend, defining types and state for products, categories, orders, user profiles, store settings, and subscription tiers, with admin-gated CRUD operations and access control via a mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of the AdminAccessControl component rewrite, listing affected files, components, and test IDs for the sequential auth gate feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key changes made to each component or page.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, border, and chart color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Game Vault app with the dark class applied, inline critical CSS to prevent white flash, and a script tag loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component implementing hash-based routing, cart state management, Internet Identity authentication, profile setup modal, and rendering of all page components wrapped in QueryClient and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays a styled 'Access Denied' screen with a shield icon and a back-to-store link, using sunset/OKLCH theme colors for unauthorized admin access attempts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminWhite: Admin UI component for managing the admin username whitelist, allowing adding and removing admin users with confirmation dialogs and React Query cache updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin table view displaying all orders with buyer details, product name (fetched per row), payment method badge, and order status badge.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentsMa: Admin payments dashboard that lists all orders in a table with payment method and approval status badges, and allows approving or declining individual orders via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form component for creating or editing a product, handling fields like game name, title, description, account details, price (converted to pence), and availability, using add/update product mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin product list view with a table of all products, supporting add (via dialog), edit, and delete (via alert dialog) operations using ProductForm and relevant query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/StoreSetti: Admin component for managing store payment wallet addresses (PayPal, Bitcoin, Ethereum), with pre-populated fields loaded from settings and individual save buttons for each wallet.
frontend/src/components/admin/Subscripti: Admin component for managing subscription tiers, allowing editing of monthly/yearly prices and toggling free trial availability per tier.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessContr: Guards admin routes by checking if the authenticated Internet Identity principal has an admin username via the backend actor, rendering children only on access granted and showing a profile setup modal or denial screen otherwise.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: A slide-in drawer component that displays cart items with remove buttons, calculates the total price, and provides a checkout action button.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCard.tsx: A styled toggle button that renders a product category name and highlights when selected, calling an onSelect callback on click.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CryptoP: Checkout component for cryptocurrency payments (BTC/ETH) that displays wallet addresses with a generated QR code, copy functionality, and converted crypto amounts.
frontend/src/components/checkout/GiftCar: Checkout component for UK gift card payments that validates a gift card code and collects the card number and balance before confirming the order.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayIn3P: Checkout component that splits a payment into 3 monthly installments, showing a schedule of due dates and requiring user agreement before confirming the first payment.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Payment: Renders a grid of selectable payment method buttons (PayPal, Cryptocurrency, UK Gift Card, Pay in 3) with visual highlight for the currently selected method.
frontend/src/components/checkout/PayPalP: Checkout component for PayPal payments that simulates a redirect flow, showing a confirmation step after the user indicates they have authorized payment on PayPal.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying the Game Vault brand, store navigation links, accepted payment methods, and a copyright bar with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: A no-op stub component kept for compatibility; actual layout is handled directly in App.tsx.
A full-screen loading splash that plays a background video and animates a clip-path text reveal over 40 seconds, then shows an 'Enter Store' button once the timer completes.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with links to Store, Subscriptions, and Admin pages, a cart icon with item count badge, and an Internet Identity login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product's category, game name, title, description, and price with an 'Add to Cart' button and a click handler to view full product details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal component that prompts new users to choose a username, with debounced availability checking and validation (no spaces, min 3 chars) before submitting via the createUsername mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides a React context and hook for managing a shopping cart, supporting add, remove, and clear operations with computed total items and total price.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing identity state, login/logout functions, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, usernames, admin checks, products, orders, and store settings via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS with Tailwind directives, a sunset-themed design token palette (OKLCH colors), custom glow utility classes, and Orbitron/Rajdhani font assignments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/models/Vehicle.tsx: Defines Three.js 3D vehicle models (SportsCar, Motorcycle, RealisticCar) as React components using react-three-fiber, with geometry, materials, and animated movement via useFrame.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page with tab-based navigation for managing products, orders, payments, admins, subscriptions, and store settings. Wraps content in AdminAccessControl to restrict access.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Multi-step checkout page (review, contact, payment method, payment details) that collects order info and submits it via usePlaceOrder, supporting PayPal, crypto, gift card, and Pay in 3 methods.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation page that fetches and displays order details including product info and live approval status (pending/approved/declined) after a successful checkout.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page showing game name, description, category, price, availability, and an add-to-cart button in a two-column layout with a sticky sidebar.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Main storefront page with a hero section, search bar, and a filtered product grid loaded from the backend, supporting search by game name, title, or description.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionCheckoutP: Multi-step subscription checkout page supporting PayPal and cryptocurrency payment methods, with a step indicator, plan review, and free trial display for a given subscription tier and billing cycle.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionsPage.tsx: React page displaying subscription tier cards (Starter, Basic, Premium, Pro) with monthly/yearly billing toggle, pricing, perks, and a subscribe button; fetches tier data via a query hook and delegates purchase handling to a parent-provided callback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with CSS-variable-based color tokens (including a sunset palette), Orbitron/Rajdhani fonts, custom box shadows, and keyframe animations; enables dark mode via class and registers animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Persistent project state document (version 65) summarizing the Game Vault ICP e-commerce app's architecture, feature set, known issues, and design decisions including the sunset theme, subscription tiers, admin panel, and payment flows.
